title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Online Science Education Quality Management and Collaborative Process Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Explain three quality management frameworks for online science education and apply them to practical cases
Improve content using five quality criteria in the collaborative process development model (instructor-instructional designer collaboration)
Design two online science education activities effective in smartphone environments and conduct peer evaluations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
